attributes.action: Review the increase of nearly 50% in solid fuel charges
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In line with reviewing other fuel charges would the prime minister look at the nearly 50% increase in solid fuel charges seriously affecting rural and low income families. The cost of running a solid fuel boiler on anthracite has increased from £107 per month last winter to £157 per month and this winters fuel payment does not reflect this meaning the choice for someone e.g. on Pension Credit being  eating or heating
